page.title: 04LIVE AID
page.content: The Madley Earth Station was one of the two Communication Centres which linked an estimated one and a half billion people in the largest pop concert the World has ever known. This took place on July 14th 1985 and raised 40 million pounds for the Ethiopian Famine. The concerts in England and USA lasted from noon on July 14th to 4am July 15th. It was truly magnificent to see the people of the world unite in this spectacular way. Never before has there been such a 'girdle of compassion' round the Earth. The plight of the starving Ethiopians has stirred the conscience of the world. The response of ordinary people proves that goodness and decency can still triumph over fear, hatred and oppression.
